text: The Basilica of Sacre-Coeur is a minor basilica in Paris, France constructed in 1885 near the site of the Paris Commune. it is in Montmartre.. The foundation was laid in 1875. It was finished in 1914. It is named after the Sacred Heart of Jesus. It is built in the Romano-Byzantine style. The church was consecrated in 1919. == Other websites == * Sacre Coeur Category:Churches in Paris Category:Buildings and structures completed in the 20th century
